DSMC Offsets & Economic Development Working Group Moves To Paris EUROSATORY | 19 June 2024 Topic: Challenges Related To Bilateral Industrial Cooperations (Offsets) In Defence & Security Date: Wednesday, 19 June 2024 Time: 13:00 - 14:00 Location: EUROSATORY, Paris About: Conference organized by GICAT and COGES concerning Challenges related to Bilateral Industrial Cooperations in Defence and Security. Mr. Guy Fr√©mond, consultant in International Cooperation, as moderator will discuss a number of subjects under this topic, to include, but not limited to the following: - Origin of Bilateral Industrial Cooperations? - Willingness of companies from different countries? - Bilateral state frame agreements? - Offset obligations? Business development? - Driving factors coming into consideration? - Strategy, industry, technics, sales? Important Note: ( *All Attendees Need to Obtain Before Arrival a EUROSATORY Entry Visitor Badge Separately from EUROSATORY Organizers directly. Please visit EUROSATORY Website Today to Register: https://lnkd.in/dXenn34H ) Guy Fr√©mond

What expertise do you have to share with Missouri cities in 2024? Share your session proposal with MML by March 1 for the MML Annual Conference that takes place Sept. 15-18 in Branson!

Today Sam and I are joined by Ryan Burge on The Burge Report to discuss what's happening and what the future may hold for the SBC. Watch on YouTube now - https://lnkd.in/e46XzTFG

The ERIC family has grown rapidly from 1 to 28 since it took off with SHARE - Survey of Health, Ageing and Retirement in Europe, the very first European Research Infrastructure Consortium (ERIC) established in March 2011. Considering that AnaEE received its ERIC status in 2022, it is still a reasonably young member, but has already been very successful in partnering with other RIs and gathering funding from projects at a European level. That demonstrates that the field we work in is very relevant, serving a wide community from food and health to environmental clusters. #researchinfrastructure #collaboration #environment
